message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the decomposition of sodium bicarbonate (baking soda) when heated?
message_2:
When sodium bicarbonate (NaHCO3) is heated, it decomposes into sodium carbonate (Na2CO3), water (H2O), and carbon dioxide (CO2). The balanced chemical equation for this decomposition reaction is:
